name: 3Gun Nation VR
description: A VR shooting Game with different MAPS and Firearms. You will learn to aim and shoot firearms in both the Real and the VR world. It is all done in the comfort and safety of your home.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 Storage: 5 GB available space
